The claim was based on President: elect Donald Trump's statement during a press conference that he was turning over control of his business to his sons, Eric and Donald, and the display of file folders as evidence of this action.
Observations made by individuals on soci: including filmmaker Amy Berg, suggested that the displayed folders contained blank sheets of paper, indicating that they may not have contained any relevant documents.
The physical characteristics of the disp: such as the lack of labeling, absence of page numbers or sticky notes, and the use of the wrong paper size, further cast doubt on their authenticity.
